title: Piece By Piece (TEFC)
brief_description: Focus on the pre-school teacher as evacuator and a decision-maker whose actions influence the quality of the experiences that children have within the educational program. What types of activity can be deemed part of evaluating, what criteria are important when evaluating and why evaluate, are some of the questions discussed
